title: InGuide
tagline: Dual-version guide: native Android app and MVF map web viewer.
description: InGuide ships as a Kotlin/Jetpack Compose Android app and a web map viewer. The app covers auth, dashboard, schedule, and AI chat UI, while the web build loads MVF zip bundles, filters floors, and visualizes debug node layers with Mapbox GL/MapLibre tooling.
highlights: Android app screens for auth, home, schedule, map, and chat (Material3)
Web viewer loads MVF zip bundles with floor filtering + legend-driven debug layers
Indoor map tooling built around Mappedin MVF data and node visualization workflows
